snippets.text: Coach Finch confirms Edwards will see increased usage with McDaniels questionable. Ankle check completed, no restrictions.
Thunder defense allows 28.4 PPG to opposing SGs in last 5 games, vulnerable to drive-heavy offensive schemes.
Edwards averaging 31.2 PPG in back-to-back scenarios this season, historically aggressive in second nights.
Doncic cleared for full minutes after rest day, expecting heavy assist load with Irving out.
Opponent allows 9.8 APG to primary ballhandlers, weakness in transition defense creates assist opportunities.
Tatum rebounding at career-high 8.9 RPG pace, emphasis on defensive glass with Horford managing minutes.
